Text:
to configure buttons

Right click on the Tk3online icon
 Click on "Quick configure"
Go to the "Options" tab
Click on "Start ePSXe for pad configuring" (on the left side, under the title "Pad settings")
click on OK
 Click on "Config -> Game pad -> Pad 1"
Configure the buttons and click on OK
 Close ePSXe and click on ok, go back to ePSXeCutor
